SELECT BDWR_SEQ, BDWR_TTL_NM, ATTACH_FILENAME, FILE_SIZE, GPBC_YN, BDWR_RTNG_CD, UPDATE_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPDATE_DATE, REG_ID, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE FROM TB_WEB_HT_BLBD WHERE 1=1 AND BLBD_DIV_CD = '101'
BDWR_TTL_NM LIKE '%' || #sKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY BDWR_RTNG_CD DESC, REG_DATE DESC

SELECT BDWR_SEQ, BDWR_TTL_NM, BDWR_CTS, ATTACH_FILENAME, FILE_SIZE, GPBC_YN, BDWR_RTNG_CD, UPDATE_ID, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPDATE_DATE, REG_ID, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE FROM TB_WEB_HT_BLBD WHERE 1=1 AND BLBD_DIV_CD = '101' AND BDWR_SEQ = #boardSeq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WEB_HT_BLBD (BLBD_DIV_CD, BDWR_SEQ, BDWR_DIV_CD, BDWR_TTL_NM, BDWR_CTS, ATTACH_FILENAME, FILE_SIZE, GPBC_YN, BDWR_RTNG_CD, REG_ID, REG_DATE) VALUES ('101', (SELECT NVL(MAX(BDWR_SEQ),0)+1 FROM TB_WEB_HT_BLBD WHERE BLBD_DIV_CD = '101'), '101', #boardTitle#, #boardContents#, #attachFileNm#, #attachFileSize#, #gpbcYn#, #rtngCd#, #userId#, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_WEB_HT_BLBD SET BDWR_TTL_NM = #boardTitle#, BDWR_CTS = #boardContents#, ATTACH_FILENAME= #attachFileNm#, FILE_SIZE = #attachFileSize#, GPBC_YN = #gpbcYn#, BDWR_RTNG_CD = #rtngCd#, UPDATE_ID = #userId#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BLBD_DIV_CD = '101' AND BDWR_SEQ = #boardSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TB_WEB_HT_BLBD WHERE BLBD_DIV_CD = '101' AND BDWR_SEQ = #boardSeq#
